descriptionHtml:
This gives you lots of camo\'s to craft all items unenchanted 

These armors are located under the leather section and misc sections at any forge. 

3 different styles of backpacks with straps for male and female characters . 
9 different outfits to wear 8 male and only one female sorry ladies. 

These would not be possible without the wonderful work by 

theRoadstrokers Alvin Hews Annika Outfit Set Stand Alone by theRoadstroker 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7818/? 
the original creator of the backpack with straps. 

Leather Backpack by Tupii and theRoadstroker 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13732//? 
This is the model I used for my backpacks 

Blue Jeans Plus Volume 3 by Andrew Clements and Nancy Krantz 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19644//? 
These are the models I used for the shirtless versions, short sleeve versions and long sleeve versions 

Thanks jpdoctor for making Linwe\'s armor re-placer for both male and female characters 
Go to his page and see his amazing work 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/6308569/?tb=mods&pUp=1

Thanks to Bethesda for making a great game
author: KalEltheKryptonian and Jpdoctor
